page_content: The page provides various tax forms and guidelines for natural persons in Basel-Stadt.
The page offers various forms and guidelines related to records management and archival processes in Basel-Stadt.
The page provides forms for gift tax declarations in Basel-Stadt.
The page discusses the transition from the LV03 to LV95 coordinate system in Basel-Stadt and offers various tools and PDF guides for the transformation.
The page provides a guide on how to integrate WFS services into QGIS, ArcGIS, and AutoCAD.
The page provides a guide on how to use the search service for various layers and how to retrieve results in JSON format.
The page provides a guide on how to use a digital mailbox for securely transmitting files to the Social Welfare Office in Basel-Stadt.
